muno.game

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • muno.game.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionCard, NumberedCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a MUNO card.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

            java.lang.Integer score,

        Constructor of the class. Creates a new card.
        Parameters:
        name - Card's name.
        score - Score that card represents.
        color - Card's color.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the parameters is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.String color)
        Sets the color of a card.
        Parameters:
        the - color to set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the card is a wild card and its color can't be changed.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the color is invalid.
